headline: Eaton and AMP IT Collaborate to Offer EV Charging-as-a-Service Integrated With Solar and Energy Storage to Building Owners in Switzerland
summary: GENEVA, June 10, 2025--Eaton, a global leader in intelligent power management, and AMP IT SA, a company focused on financing, installing and operating electric vehicle charging systems, are collaborating on a new project to help building owners optimize the efficiency and system performance of electric vehicle charging infrastructure (EVCI) without the complexity of EVCI ownership.

content.title: Eaton and AMP IT Collaborate to Offer EV Charging-as-a-Service Integrated With Solar and Energy Storage to Building Owners in Switzerland
content.summary: GENEVA, June 10, 2025--Eaton, a global leader in intelligent power management, and AMP IT SA, a company focused on financing, installing and operating electric vehicle charging systems, are collaborating on a new project to help building owners optimize the efficiency and system performance of electric vehicle charging infrastructure (EVCI) without the complexity of EVCI ownership.

thumbnail.caption: Eaton and AMP IT collaborate to offer EV charging-as-a-service integrated with solar and energy storage to building owners in Switzerland. Image courtesy of AMP IT.
